fields.name: Name
fields.title: Title
fields.sendAccessInfo: Send Email with Access Info to User

tooltips.defaultTeam: All records created by this user will be related to this team by default.
tooltips.userName: Letters a-z, numbers 0-9, dots, hyphens, @-signs and underscores are allowed.
tooltips.isActive: If unchecked then user won't be able to login.
tooltips.teams: Teams which this user belongs to. Access control level is inherited from team's roles.
tooltips.roles: Additional access roles. Use it if user doesn't belong to any team or you need to extend access control level exclusively for this user.
tooltips.portalRoles: Additional portal roles. Use it to extend access control level exclusively for this user.
tooltips.portals: Portals which this user has access to.
tooltips.layoutSet: Layouts from a specified set will be applied for the user instead of default ones.

messages.loginAs: Open the login link in an incognito window to preserve your current session. Use your admin credentials to log in.
messages.sendPasswordChangeLinkConfirmation: An email with a unique link will be sent to the user allowing them to change their password. The link will expire after a specific amount of time.
messages.passwordRecoverySentIfMatched: Assuming the entered data matched any user account.
messages.passwordStrengthLength: Must be at least {length} characters long.
messages.passwordStrengthBothCases: Must contain letters of both upper and lower case.
messages.passwordWillBeSent: Password will be sent to user's email address.
messages.emailAddressCantBeEmpty: Email Address can not be empty
messages.uniqueLinkHasBeenSent: The unique URL has been sent to the specified email address.
messages.setupSmtpBefore: You need to setup [SMTP settings]({url}) to make the system be able to send password in email.
messages.choose2FaSmsPhoneNumber: Select a phone number that will be used for 2FA.
messages.choose2FaEmailAddress: Select an email address that will be used for 2FA. It's highly recommended to use a non-primary email address.
messages.enterCodeSentInEmail: Enter the code sent to your email address.
messages.enterCodeSentBySms: Enter the code sent by SMS to your phone number.
messages.enterTotpCode: Enter a code from your authenticator app.
messages.verifyTotpCode: Scan the QR-code with your mobile authenticator app. If you have a trouble with scanning, you can enter the secret manually. After that you will see a 6-digit code in your application. Enter this code in the field below.
messages.generateAndSendNewPassword: A new password will be generated and sent to the user's email address.
messages.security2FaResetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the current 2FA settings?
messages.auth2FARequired: You need to set up 2 factor authentication. Use an authenticator application on your mobile phone (e.g. Google Authenticator).
messages.ldapUserInEspoNotFound: User is not found in EspoCRM. Contact your administrator to create the user.
messages.passwordChangeRequestNotFound: The password change request is not found. It might be expired. Try to initiate a new password recovery from the [login page]({url}).
